alert.note: Alert for Greater Vancouver Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 23 at 4:12AM PST until December 23 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...In Oregon, Greater Portland Metro Area. In Washington, Greater Vancouver Area. * WHEN...Until 7 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Advisory level winds will become increasingly confined to areas near the Columbia Gorge as this morning progresses.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
